original: @65b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @65b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: sna'i nad gso bar byed par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas khrus kyi cho ga lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad byas te /
analyzed: sna'i nad gso bar byed par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas khrus kyi cho ga lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad byas te /
translated: The practitioner who wishes to heal a nose disease should perform the ritual of bathing one hundred and eight times, abiding in the pride of VajravidƒÅra·πáa.

original: de nas rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal du gnas pa'i thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od snga ma ltar 'phros pa las don gnyis byas ba'i tha ma dri'i lha mo rnams bdag nyid kyi sna la thim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shangs dri ma med pa
analyzed: de nas rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal du gnas pa'i thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od snga ma ltar 'phros pa las don gnyis byas ba'i tha ma dri'i lha mo rnams bdag nyid kyi sna la thim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shangs dri ma med pa
translated: Then, light radiates from the seed syllable in the heart as before, performs the two benefits, and finally the goddesses of smell dissolve into one‚Äôs nose. Imagine that one possesses the stainless nose of all buddhas,

original: yongs su dag pa ye shes tshogs pa'i phung po las grub pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes go ma 'gags pa sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa dang ldan par dmigs shing snying po rgyas bsdus ci rigs bar bzlas so //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa ye shes tshogs pa'i phung po las grub pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes go ma 'gags pa sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa dang ldan par dmigs shing snying po rgyas bsdus ci rigs bar bzlas so //
translated: which is the aggregate of the accumulation of wisdom, the unobstructed wisdom of omniscience, and the wisdom of the buddhas. Recite the essence mantra as much as appropriate, extensive or concise.

original: de ltar sna tshub pa rnams la 'bru mar la bzlas la blugs so //
analyzed: de ltar sna tshub pa rnams la 'bru mar la bzlas la blugs so //
translated: In that way, for those with a runny nose, recite over sesame oil and pour it into the nose.

original: khrag 'bab cing dbugs stong pa bkab na tsandan dkar po la bzlas so //
analyzed: khrag 'bab cing dbugs stong pa bkab na tsandan dkar po la bzlas so //
translated: If blood flows and the breath is obstructed, recite over white sandalwood.

original: zug che ba rnams la gi wang 'o ma la sbyar ba la bzlas shing sna phug tu blugs so //
analyzed: zug che ba rnams la gi wang 'o ma la sbyar ba la bzlas shing sna phug tu blugs so //
translated: For severe pain, recite over yellow orpiment mixed with milk and insert it into the nostrils.

original: sna'i dbang po nyams pa dang na ba gso ba dri ma dang bral ba'i sbyong byed ces bya ba /
analyzed: sna'i dbang po nyams pa dang na ba gso ba dri ma dang bral ba'i sbyong byed ces bya ba /
translated: The Purification of Odors, the Restorer and Healer of the Impaired and Diseased Sense of SmellüîΩComposed by ƒÄcƒÅrya J√±ƒÅnavajra
